name: Dj Case
overview:
DJ-Case.com is a site to help the all Djs seeking for the best house music. DJs share their favorite house selections.

The site represents what tunes are in everyone’s DJ Case at the moment. It is updated whenever there is something new from the world of electro house music.

The site does not host any of the tracks; Rather, it provides the urls to download great tracks which are already in the web.

So basically, according to the license policy you will need to delete those tracks after listening and go buy yourself the licensed original at some music store.

DJ Case has plans to soon have a page with online music stores that they suggest.

They will also compile some FAQs for beginners on how to search, download and sort your music.
